revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Col I;The 3rd year. Account of rents which we have received ;from the house in Crocodilopolis. ;or a wine-store paying 120 drachmae the month, ;from Choiack to Phamenoth of the said year 480 dr. ;From Philoumene paying 40 dr. the month, ;from Choiack to Mecheir 120 dr. ;From Ammonia paying 40 dr. the month, ;from Hathyr to Pachon 260 dr., remainder 20. ;Philotera paying 150 dr. the month ;from Choiach: Irene 100; ;for fulling a manthle 150; ;Ithake 100; ;Apollonia in respect of the stakes 100; ;through Sokles 400, ;other 450, ;other 50 being the balance up to Mesore. ;Col. II;Demetria paying 100 dr. the month, ;from Hathyr: towards this we have received ;from her up to Tybi 300 dr. ;other up to Mesore 700. ;(blank space of about 2-3 lines);For the upper roon paying 300 dr. the month,;from Mecheir: towards this we have received ;up to Pharmouthi 900 dr., ;up to Payni other 600 dr. which Attalos paid, ;through Sokles up ;to Mesore 600 dr.

listBibl.bibl: Edgar CC-Hunt AS, Select Papyri I, 184, 1932 -- SB V 7521 -- Soellner MA, ZPE 107, 1995, 83 (for dating)
